1298570.name: Aether Way Demo
1298570.description:
Aether Way is a 2D space RTS with action/roguelike elements. You play as some abstract life form, that travels across the space and evolves. You'll need to find your star system, secure its borders and defeat enemies, additionally developing the economy, exploring the space and completing missions.
This demo contains first level of the main game and 4 tactic levels. You can play for the Floral race only. Average play time - 2~4 hours.
